title: Is it the servers causing lag?

embed.description: Test your Internet connection bandwidth to locations around the world with this interactive broadband speed test from Ookla

body:
So I had some terrible lag last game that had the ping on +300. 
I was just wondering if there's anyway I can avoid such horrendous lag or is it just the LoL servers?
